data.title: Orange County Business Council (OCBC)
data.meta_description: Orange County Business Council (OCBC) is the leading voice of business reinforcing the economic influence of Orange County. OCBC, a legacy council in leadership
data.meta_site_name: Orange County Business Council (OCBC) - The Home of Orange County
data.text:
When you’re the sixth largest county in the nation, home to the largest convention center on the west coast and the world’s most iconic theme park, and your backyard is headquarters to some of the country’s brightest companies, your economic footprint is powerful.

For over 25 years, Orange County Business Council (OCBC) has been the leading voice of business reinforcing the economic influence of Orange County. Whether it’s advocating locally, in Sacramento or in Washington D.C. on behalf of its members, or bringing together the business community, government and academia to promote economic development, OCBC leads the charge in preserving Orange County as California’s economic powerhouse.

For over 25 years, Orange County Business Council (OCBC) has been the leading voice of business reinforcing the economic influence of Orange County. Whether it’s advocating locally, in Sacramento or in Washington D.C. on behalf of its members, or bringing together the business community, government and academia to promote economic development, OCBC leads the charge in preserving Orange County as California’s economic powerhouse.

From its humble beginnings of orange groves, Orange County today is home to a cross section of business sectors—from space travel, medical devices, biotechnology, healthcare and electric vehicles, to higher education, tourism, sports and entertainment and more.

Enjoying the best of what Orange County has to offer—beaches, mountains, hiking, bike trails, and a variety of cultural and entertainment activities along with outstanding colleges and universities—together with its powerful economic footprint is what makes Orange County ideal for a work-life balance.
